name: BrikZ | Launcher | With a Sharingan
description:
Meet me! A new Arcanoid game!

There are several interactive levels in the game where you can test your reaction or just have fun. Have a good game!

Attention! 

The game supports auto-update function! If you want to become a beta tester, please enable this feature in the launcher to be the first to receive updates.

You are welcome!

Do not be afraid if the game is marked with a virus, the launcher does not have a digital signature, so Windows cannot identify the publisher, this problem will disappear the next time the game is loaded.

A secret ability!

The game has Sharingan, Laser, second chance, long board and shadow cloning, very useful abilities that need to be used wisely!
